headline: Dollar General (DG) Valuation Check After Margin Recovery And Shrink Improvements Fuel Investor Optimism
summary: Dollar General (DG) is back in focus after being cited as a major positive contributor in a recent fourth quarter update, with robust same store sales and margin expansion tied to higher traffic and lower shrink. See our latest analysis for Dollar General. The recent earnings beat and progress on shrink appear to be resonating with investors, with a 90 day share price return of 47.14% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 110.73%, even though the 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns...
